info.description: This is a simple RESTful Point of Sale (POS) Service API written in Go using Gin web framework, PostgreSQL database, and Redis cache.
info.title: Go POS (Point of Sale) API

post.description: create a new category with name

put.description: update a category's name by id

get.description: List orders and return an array of order data with purchase details

post.description: Create a new order and return the order data with purchase details

get.description: Get an order by id and return the order data with purchase details

post.description: create a new payment with name, type, and logo

put.description: update a payment's name, type, or logo by id

post.description: create a new product with name, image, price, and stock

get.description: get a product by id with its category

put.description: update a product's name, image, price, or stock by id

post.description: create a new user account with default role "cashier"
Logs in a registered user and returns an access token if the credentials are valid.
post.summary: Login and get an access token

put.description: Update a user's name, email, password, or role by id

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and the access token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
